Package model

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Car class represents a Car object. It contains a list of OptionSets, and each of them contains a list of Options.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
